review.title: “Fantastic product, fantastic team!”
review.pros: Pros – Great team - knowlegable people who genuinely care about each other, about building a great product, and about making a difference.Founders are serial entrepreneurs - they've done this before, successfully, and want to do it again.Location is near caltrain and ball park - easy to get to by public trans and/or car.Kegerator!!
review.cons: Cons – I really can't think of any.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Keep doing what you're doing - it's working.
